Title: Prohibits method of payment pricing of gasoline
Summary: Prohibits method of payment pricing of gasoline, wherein the price per gallon of motor fuel of like grade or quality that is offered for sale or sold by a retail outlet using a credit or debit card varies by more than three percent of the cash price.
LawCode: Amd ยง399-ee, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to method of payment pricing of gasoline
